mapper.select: SELECT question_no questionNo, Lecture_no lectureNo, account_id accountId, question_writer questionWriter, question_title questionTitle, question_content questionContent, question_createdate questionCreateDate, question_updatedate questionUpdateDate, question_count questionCount, question_password questionPassword FROM question WHERE lecutre_no ORDER BY question_no=#{questionNo} DESC LIMIT #{beginRow}, #{rowPerPage}

SELECT q.question_no, q.lecture_no, q.account_id, q.question_writer, q.question_title, q.question_content, q.question_createdate, q.question_updatedate, q.question_count, q.question_password, qc.question_comment_no, qc.question_no, qc.account_id, qc.question_comment_writer, qc.question_comment_content, qc.question_comment_createdate, qc.question_comment_updatedate, qcf.question_comment_file_uuid, qcf.question_comment_file_original, qcf.question_comment_no, qcf.question_comment_file_size, qcf.question_comment_file_type, qcf.question_comment_file_count, qcf.question_comment_file_createdate FROM question q LEFT JOIN question_comment qc ON q.question_no = qc.question_no LEFT JOIN question_comment_file qcf ON qc.question_comment_no = qcf.question_comment_no WHERE q.accoutId=#{accountId}

SELECT question_no questionNo, Lecture_no lectureNo, account_id accountId, question_writer questionWriter, question_title questionTitle, question_context questionContent, question_createdate questionCreateDate, question_updatedate questionUpdateDate, question_count questionCount FROM question WHERE question_no=#{questionNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE question SET question_title=#{questionTitle}, question_content=#{questionContent}, question_updatedate=NOW() WHERE account_id=#{accountId}
